name: Ext_R5_Composition_ev_detail
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Composition.event.detail for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Composition.event.detail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The event(s) being documented, as code(s), reference(s), or both
element.definition: Represents the main clinical acts, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented. In some cases, the event is inherent in the typeCode, such as a "History and Physical Report" in which case the procedure being documented is necessarily a "History and Physical" act. The events may be included as a code or as a reference to an other resource.
element.comment: `Composition.event.detail` maps to R4B `Composition.event.detail`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts being documented.
